kpi_info.title: Average successful setup time
kpi_info.use: This KPI tells the average successful setup time
kpi_info.use_experience:
Formula corrected to AVG 26.09.05

The unit of time in ASCII report is seconds, in XML reports, it is 10 milliseconds. The KPI formula/unit is valid for ASCII reports.
PUBLISHED: M13
THEORETICAL SUMMARY LEVELS: PLMN; MSC; CGRDIR; CGRNAME;UPD

RECOMMENDED SUMMARY LEVELS: PLMN; MSC

KPI CLASS: Traffic
MEASUREMENT(S): Call setup time and success measurement (386/182H)
